button.t-attf-class: btn btn-secondary fa fa-lg #{view.icon} o_cp_switch_#{view.type} #{viewType === view.type ? ' active' : ''}

t.t-if: item.create_uid and item.write_uid and item.create_uid[0] != item.write_uid[0]

p.t: Try to add some records, or make sure that there is no active filter in the search bar.

main.p:
Among the selected records, are valid for this update.
Are you sure you want to perform the following update on those records ?

div.div:
Hit ENTER to SAVE
Hit ESCAPE to DISCARD

Hit ENTER to CREATE
Hit DOWN to navigate to the list below

t.div: Select a model to add a filter.

div.t: Match records with the following rule:

button.class: btn btn-sm btn-primary fa fa-plus o_domain_leaf_value_add_tag_button
button.title: Add tag

li.t-attf-class: o_field_selector_item #{relationToFollow and 'o_field_selector_next_page' or 'o_field_selector_select_button'}#{line_index == 0 and ' active' or ''}

t.t-value: ['No color', 'Red', 'Orange', 'Yellow', 'Light blue', 'Dark purple', 'Salmon pink', 'Medium blue', 'Dark blue', 'Fushia', 'Green', 'Purple']

button.title: Current state
button.t-attf-class: btn o_arrow_button btn-primary disabled #{is_dropdown ? 'dropdown-item bg-primary text-white': ''}

button.title: Not active state, click to change it

t.t-attf-aria-label: Click to change current state to #{i.display_name}

div.div: By clicking Adopt and Sign, I agree that the chosen signature/initials will be a valid electronic representation of my hand-written signature/initials for all purposes when it is used on documents, including legally binding contracts.

t.t-esc: filter.attrs.string or filter.attrs.help or filter.attrs.name or 'Ω'

span.class: o_mobile_search_close float-left mt16 mb16 mr8 ml16

div.class: o_mobile_search_filter o_search_options mb8 mt8 ml16 mr16

div.label: I want to update data (import-compatible export)

t.li: Tap on the list to change company

div.class: ml-auto pl-3 pr-3 border border-top-0 border-left-0 border-bottom-0 toggle_company o_py
d-flex flex-grow-1 align-items-center py-0 log_into pl-3 o_py

div.div:
Get this feature and much more with Odoo Enterprise!
Access to all Enterprise Apps
New design
Mobile support
Upgrade to future versions
Bugfixes guarantee
And more

div.t-attf-class: progress-bar transition-off bg-#{color_value}-full#{count ? ' o_bar_has_records' : ''}#{widget.activeFilter ? ' progress-bar-animated progress-bar-striped' : ''}

t.div: There is no available image to be set as cover.

div.t-attf-class: o_cw_popover popover card shadow #{typeof color === 'number' ? _.str.sprintf('o_calendar_color_%s', color) : ''}

span.t-attf-class: o_cw_filter_input_bg align-items-center d-flex flex-shrink-0 justify-content-center position-relative mr-1 #{widget.avatar_field ? 'o_beside_avatar' : ''}

i.class: o_cw_filter_avatar fa fa-users fa-fw flex-shrink-0 mr-1
i.title: Avatar

button.class: o_remove btn bg-white text-700 py-0 px-2
button.title: Remove this favorite from the list
button.aria-label: Remove this favorite from the list

form.div: Due to its large size, the file will be imported by batches.

Click 'Resume' to proceed with the import, resuming at line 0.
You can test or reload your file before resuming the import.

div.title: If the model uses openchatter, history tracking will set up subscriptions and send notifications during the import, but lead to a slower import.
div.label: Track history during import
The first row contains the label of the column

div.title: Warning: ignores the labels line, empty lines and lines composed only of empty cells
div.label: Start at line

div.p: If the file contains the column names, Odoo can try auto-detecting the field corresponding to the column. This makes imports simpler especially when the file has many columns.
Select a CSV or Excel file to import.
Excel files are recommended as fields formatting is automatic.

label.title: Creates new records if they can't be found (instead of failing to import). Note that the value in the column will be used as the new record's 'name', and assumes this is sufficient to create the record.

div.p: For CSV files, you may need to select the correct separator.
Here is the start of the file we could not import:

div.div:
If you edit and save this file, you will never receive updates from Odoo anymore unless you reset your customizations.
×

label.title: 'Alt tag' specifies an alternate text for an image, if the image cannot be displayed (slow connection, missing image, screen reader ...).
'Title tag' is shown as a tooltip when you hover the picture.

span.class: o_we_url_success text-success d-none fa fa-lg fa-check
span.title: The URL seems valid.

span.class: o_we_url_warning text-warning d-none fa fa-lg fa-warning
o_we_url_error text-danger d-none fa fa-lg fa-times
span.title: The URL does not seem to work.

t.t: The URL does not contain any image. The file will be added in the document section.
The URL contains an image. The file will be added in the image section.

div.small: Resizing is not supported for images of type .
Changing the quality is not supported for images of type .

div.p: You can upload images with the button located in the top left of the screen.
You can upload documents with the button located in the top left of the screen.

t.t: This file is a public view attachment.
This file is attached to the current record.

div.p: The image could not be deleted because it is used in the following pages or views:

textarea.placeholder: Copy-paste your URL or embed code here

div.small: Accepts Youtube, Vimeo, Dailymotion and Youku videos

label.span: Videos are muted when autoplay is enabled

div.h4: This image is an external image
div.p:
This type of image is not supported for cropping.
If you want to crop it, please first download it from the original source and upload it in Odoo.

span.style: margin: 5px; position: fixed; top: 0; right: 0; z-index: 2000;

button.style: width: 24px; height: 24px; background-color: #337ab7; border: 1px solid #2e6da4; border-radius: 4px; padding: 0; position: relative;

div.h6: Assign a focal point that will always be visible

fieldset.p: Sets the width and height of the background image in percent of the parent element.
Set the starting position of the background image.
Define if/how the background image will be repeated
